an7.54:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.54:1.2: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena sutavato ariyasavakassa vicikiccha nuppajjati abyakatavatthusu”ti?
an7.54:2.1: “Ditthinirodha kho, bhikkhu, sutavato ariyasavakassa vicikiccha nuppajjati abyakatavatthusu.
an7.54:2.2: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, ditthigatametam;
an7.54:2.3: ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, ditthigatametam;
an7.54:2.4: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, ditthigatametam;
an7.54:2.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, ditthigatametam.
an7.54:2.6: Assutava, bhikkhu, puthujjano ditthim nappajanati, ditthisamudayam nappajanati, ditthinirodham nappajanati, ditthinirodhagaminim patipadam nappajanati.
an7.54:2.7: Tassa sa ditthi pavaddhati, so na parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmati vadami.
an7.54:3.1: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhu, ariyasavako ditthim pajanati, ditthisamudayam pajanati, ditthinirodham pajanati, ditthinirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati.
an7.54:3.2: Tassa sa ditthi nirujjhati, so parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, parimuccati dukkhasmati vadami.
an7.54:3.3: Evam janam kho, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako evam passam ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na byakaroti;
an7.54:3.4: ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na byakaroti;
an7.54:3.5: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na byakaroti;
an7.54:3.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na byakaroti.
an7.54:3.7: Evam janam kho, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako evam passam evam abyakaranadhammo hoti abyakatavatthusu.
an7.54:3.8: Evam janam kho, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako evam passam na chambhati, na kampati, na vedhati, na santasam apajjati abyakatavatthusu.
an7.54:4.1: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, tanhagatametam …pe…
an7.54:4.6: ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, vippatisaro eso;
an7.54:4.7: ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, vippatisaro eso;
an7.54:4.8: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, vippatisaro eso;
an7.54:4.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti kho, bhikkhu, vippatisaro eso.
an7.54:4.10: Assutava, bhikkhu, puthujjano vippatisaram nappajanati, vippatisarasamudayam nappajanati, vippatisaranirodham nappajanati, vippatisaranirodhagaminim patipadam nappajanati.
an7.54:4.11: Tassa so vippatisaro pavaddhati, so na parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmati vadami.
an7.54:5.1: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhu, ariyasavako vippatisaram pajanati, vippatisarasamudayam pajanati, vippatisaranirodham pajanati, vippatisaranirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati.
an7.54:5.2: Tassa so vippatisaro nirujjhati, so parimuccati jatiya …pe… dukkhasmati vadami.
an7.54:5.3: Evam janam kho, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako evam passam ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na byakaroti …pe…
an7.54:5.4: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na byakaroti.
an7.54:5.5: Evam janam kho, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako evam passam evam abyakaranadhammo hoti abyakatavatthusu.
an7.54:5.6: Evam janam kho, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako evam passam na chambhati, na kampati, na vedhati, na santasam apajjati abyakatavatthusu.
an7.54:5.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu ayam paccayo yena sutavato ariyasavakassa vicikiccha nuppajjati abyakatavatthusu”ti.
